ingredients.ingredient: 2 (4 ounce) fillets mahi mahi fillets, rinsed and patted dry

cookingTips: Mix maple syrup with Cajun seasoning to create a glaze that caramelizes on the fish
Cook mahi mahi over medium-high heat for 3-4 minutes per side for firm, flaky texture
Brush with maple-Cajun glaze in the last minute of cooking for best flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through creating a spiced mahi mahi with a subtle maple glaze that brings out the fish's natural sweetness.
